availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of John Barret and Mary Barret. Attorney in Columbus, Hickman County, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 155A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Columbus, p. 475.
Find A Grave, "George T. Barret (May 5, 1835-July 6, 1903)," Memorial #97842358, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/97842358 (accessed April 10, 2019).
